title: Aromatherapy for Healing the Spirit by Gabriel Mojay
author: Pamela VanMeter
description: The first aromatherapy guide to synthesize Eastern and Western approaches to restoring emotional and mental health. Explains the esoteric and energetic healing properties of 40 essential oils to help restore balance to the body and psyche. Provides help for a wide range of common emotional and mental complaints.
